thread.title: Undateable Will Pull Double Duty and Tape Live for Both Coasts - Burlington Times News
thread.title_full: Undateable Will Pull Double Duty and Tape Live for Both Coasts - Burlington Times News - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Burlington Times News
title: Undateable Will Pull Double Duty and Tape Live for Both Coasts - Burlington Times News
text:
Undateable is doubling down on its live shows! Currently in its third season, Undateable is already airing each episode as a live event, and is now going to be taking it one step further and tape live for both the east and west coast airings, according to The Hollywood Reporter . When the sitcom toyed with the live format in Season 2, it recorded two versions of the episode, one for each coast, but has only been airing live for the east coast in its current season.
 Burlington Times News.
